p: The anti-oxidant activity of an ethanol extract of twigs of E. robustum, its fractions and the isolated compounds 16 and 17, 41 and 101 resulted in unphysiological IC 50 values (≥1.13 mg/ml) using a DPPH method ( Awouafack et al., 2013b). Using the same assay, compounds 5 and 72 displayed IC 50 values of 340.3 and 524.6 μM, respectively, while that of ascorbic acid was 35.9 μM ( Awouafack et al., 2018).
